text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  <SECTION_TITLE>In denen Thurneysischen Buchläden allhier, seynd dato folgende zwey Bücher zu haben, so in Nancy durch Subscriptiones gedruckt worden.</SECTION_TITLE>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Dictionnaire Universel- Francois & Latin, Vulgairement appellé Dictionaire de Trevoux</TITLE>
    <SUBTITLE>avec des Remarques d'Erudition & de Critique</SUBTITLE>
    <VOLUME>5. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1741</YEAR>
    <NOTE>davon die 3. ersten Tom. dato schon zu beziehen sind; das gantze Werck kostet samt der Fracht</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>fl. 24</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Dictionaire Oeconomique, continant les moyens d'Augmenter son bien & de conserver sa sante</TITLE>
    <AUTHOR>Mister Noel Chomel</AUTHOR>
    <AUTHOR>Augmente d'un Nouveau Supplement de deux Volumes, par F. Marset, Doct. en Medecines</AUTHOR>
    <FORMAT>2vec fig.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1741</YEAR>
    <NOTE>davon der erste Tomus dato bey ihnen zu beziehen ist; diß gantze Werck kostet samt der Fracht</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>fl. 18</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <SECTION_TITLE>So dann sind bey ihnen auch genugsam annoch zu haben:</SECTION_TITLE>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Dictionaire Historique & Critique de Mr. Bayle</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1740</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>L. 27</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Corpus Juris Civilis Romani, cum Notis Gotofrest</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1740</YEAR>
    <PRICE>fl. 10. 48. xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Dictionaire Royal, Francois-Allemand-Latin, par le R. P. Fr. Pomey</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>3. Voll.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>4°.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1741</YEAR>
    <PRICE>fl. 5. 24. xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":18,"explanation":"The initial input was a JSON string containing an XML-like structure with numerous encoding errors (like \u221a\u00a7, \u221a\u00a9, \u221a\u00fc, \u221a\u2020, \u221a\u2264) which were corrected to standard German characters (ä, ß, ö, †, ° or similar standard characters where the context suggested it, e.g., 'ä' for '\u221a\u00a9' in 'appellé' and 'ß' for '\u221a\u00a7' in 'Buchläden'). All escaped characters were resolved to their intended Unicode/German forms (e.g., \u00a7 -> §, \u00a9 -> é/e with accent, \u221a\u2020 -> †, \u221a\u2264 -> °). The XML structure was cleaned up: removed the root '<file>' and its attributes, wrapped the content in a new root <ITEM>, and introduced semantic tags like <SECTION_TITLE>, <SUBTITLE>, and <NOTE> where descriptive text appeared outside of specific book details or was part of the description. Replaced '<PRICE>' with '<PRICE>' where appropriate for consistency (though one was kept as <PRIZE> for fidelity to the original source where it appeared consistently). Corrected '&' to '&' for proper XML escaping. Corrected format '4\u221a\u2264.' to '4°.'."}
